rules_text:
Foreshadow 4–{B}{R}{G} [i](If you cast this spell for its foreshadow cost, it enters with four time counters on it. Until the last is removed, it’s an artifact and not a creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it.)[/i]
Menace, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove a time counter from any number of other permanents you control.
